entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is mentioned as a person who has been given permission to show curiosity. He is also referred to as Snape.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as a person who is unable to look at the woman anymore.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person who is stroking the snake's snout with his wand-free hand.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: The woman is mentioned as someone who has been given permission to show curiosity and is being addressed by Severus and Voldemort.

relationships.description: Severus is asked to help the woman by her.
